metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7555 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in giffix.c in giffix in giflib 5.1.1 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (program crash) via crafted imageand logical screen width fields in a GIF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7555` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

giflib-tools - 5.1.2-0.1
libgif7 - 5.1.2-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: giflib package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.2-0.1').
